${ModID}:AcidicSpray.NAME: Acidic Spray
${ModID}:AcidicSpray.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害 for each debuff on the target. NL 给予 !M! 层 虚弱 。

${ModID}:PoisonMastery.NAME: Poison Mastery
${ModID}:PoisonMastery.DESCRIPTION: Increase 生命 loss from Poison by 100%. NL 获得 a *Poison *Potion。
${ModID}:PoisonMastery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Increase 生命 loss from Poison by 100%. NL 获得 !M! *Poison *Potions。

${ModID}:CaptainsCabin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 获得 !M! *Cannonballs。

${ModID}:TerrorOfTheSeas.NAME: Terror of the Seas
${ModID}:TerrorOfTheSeas.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Ruin to ALL enemies. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:MassProduction.NAME: Mass Production
${ModID}:MassProduction.DESCRIPTION: Choose 一张牌 in your 抽牌堆。 消耗 your hand and replace it with copies of that card. 消耗 。

${ModID}:ScrapCannon.NAME: Scrap Cannon
${ModID}:ScrapCannon.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 消耗 一张牌。

${ModID}:BloodRitual.NAME: Blood Ritual
${ModID}:BloodRitual.DESCRIPTION: 失去 !M! 生命。 NL 获得 1 Ritual。

${ModID}:OverTime.NAME: Over Time
${ModID}:OverTime.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL For each card that you've *消耗ed 本场战斗, increase damage by !M!。

${ModID}:SlimeSpray.NAME: Slime Spray
${ModID}:SlimeSpray.DESCRIPTION: 保留 。 NL 造成 !D! 点伤害, apply !M! Poison, and apply Slow to ALL enemies。

${ModID}:StickStrike.NAME: Stick Strike
${ModID}:StickStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Shuffle a *Stick into your 抽牌堆。

${ModID}:Stick.NAME: Stick
${ModID}:Stick.DESCRIPTION: *Stick *Strikes deal !M! more damage 本场战斗. Return the last-played one to your hand. 消耗 。
